skins.name: Zani
skins.attributes_description: Used to unlock a Resonator-specific outfit that grants the designated Resonator a new look.
skins.description:
She leans casually against the railing, her sweater soft against the light, appearing equally elegant as she is relaxed. Changing up the style every now and then isn't so bad.

Turning slightly, Zani looks down at the city stretching beneath her. The afternoon sunlight spills over the buildings, their outlines shimmering in the glow. She gazes quietly, letting the city's clamor become the backdrop to this moment of ease.

skins.name: Zani
skins.description: A custom-made uniform, primarily of simple black and white color schemes. No matter how heavy the work load, one must maintain an impeccable appearance.

tags.name: Spectro DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides Spectro DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

tags.name: Spectro Frazzle
tags.description: Utilizes Spectro Frazzle for combat advantage

193.name: When the Alarm Clock Rings
193.description:
Casting <color=Highlight>Targeted Action</color> or <color=Highlight>Forcible Riposte</color> gives a {0} Spectro DMG Bonus for {1}s.
Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Nightfall</color> can't be interrupted.

194.name: Stale Bread With Energy Drink
194.description:
Crit. Rate is increased by {0}.
The DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Targeted Action</color> and <color=Highlight>Forcible Riposte</color> is increased by {1}.

195.name: Each Day A New Commute
195.description: When in <color=Highlight><te href=850064>Inferno Mode</te></color>, every {0} <te href=850065>Blazes</te> consumed increases the last stage DMG Multiplier of the subsequent Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>The Last Stand</color> by {1}, maxed at {2}.

196.name: More Efficiency, Less Drama
196.description: When Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Immediate Execution</color> is cast, the ATK of all Resonators in the team is increased by {0} for {1}s.

197.name: Delivered In Full On Time
197.description: The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Rekindle</color> is increased by {0}.

198.name: First Things First? Clock Out!
198.description:
The DMG Multipliers of <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Daybreak</color>, <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash- Dawning</color>, <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Nightfall</color>, and <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Lightsmash</color> are increased by {0}. Every <te href=850065>Blaze</te> consumed increases the DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Nightfall</color> by {0} on hit.
Gain following effects when in <color=Highlight><te href=850064>Inferno Mode</te></color>: 
- When Blaze is lower than {1}, restore {2} Blazes immediately. This effect is triggered once in <color=Highlight>Inferno Mode</color>.
- Within {3}s after entering <color=Highlight>Inferno Mode</color>, Zani will remain standing with at least 1 HP if hit by a fatal blow.

params.name: Routine Negotiation
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks to deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
After performing <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 3</color>, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> at the right time to perform Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Breakthrough</color>, which can be followed by <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 4</color> by {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tapping PC=pressing Gamepad=pressing} Normal Attack again.

<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> within a certain time to perform <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 3</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to perform a plunging attack, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> within a certain time to perform <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 3</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> within a certain time after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. Then {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> at the right time to cast Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Breakthrough</color>.

params.name: Restless Watch
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Standard Defense Protocol</color></size>
Attack the target to deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> and enter a block stance. This state ends early if Zani is switched off the field. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> within a certain time to perform <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 3</color>, recovering 10 points of <te href=850063>Redundant Energy</te> and Stagnating the target on hit.
When attacked by an enemy while in block stance, reduce this instance of damage by 100% and Stagnate nearby targets, then cast <color=Highlight>Pinpoint Strike</color>, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> and further reducing their <te href=850062>Vibration Strength</te> by  {0}. DMG taken by Zani is reduced by {3} within the next {2}s.

<size=40><color=Title>Crisis Response Protocol</color></size>
When Zani is not in <color=Highlight><te href=850064>Inferno Mode</te></color> and has full <te href=850063>Redundant Energy</te>, her <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> is replaced with Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Crisis Response Protocol</color>.
Hold <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> to enter <color=Highlight>Ready Stance</color>. While in <color=Highlight>Ready Stance</color>, Zani is immune to interruption. This state ends early if Zani is switched off the field. After releasing <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> button or when the stance duration ends, consume all Redundant Energy to cast <color=Highlight>Targeted Action</color>, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, which is also considered <color=Highlight>Spectro Frazzle DMG</color>.
When attacked by an enemy in while in <color=Highlight>Ready Stance</color>, reduce this instance of damage by 100% and consume all Redundant Energy to cast <color=Highlight>Forcible Riposte</color>, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> (also considered <color=Highlight>Spectro Frazzle DMG</color>), Stagnating the target, and further reducing their <te href=850062>Vibration Strength</te> by {1}. DMG taken by Zani is reduced by {3} within the next {2}s.
Casting <color=Highlight>Targeted Action</color> or <color=Highlight>Forcible Riposte</color> sends Zani into <color=Highlight>Sunburst</color> mode and inflicts a stack of <te href=850066>Heliacal Ember</te> upon the target on hit. The last stage of the attack recovers <te href=850065>Blaze</te>.

<size=40><color=Title>Sunburst</color></size>
The <color=Highlight><te href=850008>Spectro Frazzle</te></color> DMG dealt by Zani to the target is Amplified by {4}.

params.name: Between Dawn and Dusk
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Rekindle</color></size>
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> and enter <color=Highlight>Inferno Mode</color>, increasing Max <te href=850065>Blaze</te> from {0} to {1} and granting {2} Blazes. When in <color=Highlight>Inferno Mode</color>, the DMG Multiplier of Basic Attack is increased.

<size=40><color=Title>The Last Stand</color></size>
When in <color=Highlight>Inferno Mode</color>, Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>The Last Stand</color> becomes available when Blaze is lower than {3} or after {4}s in <color=Highlight>Inferno Mode</color>.
Casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>The Last Stand</color> deals <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> and ends the <color=Highlight>Inferno Mode</color>.

params.name: Quick Response
params.description: Casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Immediate Execution</color> gives {0} Spectro DMG Bonus for {1}s.

params.name: Fear No Pain
params.description: When in <color=Highlight><te href=850173>Ready Stance</te></color>, all DMG taken is reduced by {0}.

params.name: There Will Be A Light
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Heliacal Ember</color></size>
When Zani is in the team and a nearby Resonator inflicts <color=Highlight><te href=850008>Spectro Frazzle</te></color> upon a target, immediately consume all Spectro Frazzle stacks and trigger the corresponding DMG, then convert Spectro Frazzle into an equal number of Heliacal Embers. Every time the conversion happens, Zani obtains Blaze based on the stacks of Heliacal Ember inflicted. Heliacal Ember is capped at {0} stacks, with each stack lasting for {1}s. Heliacal Ember stacks are counted toward the Spectro Frazzle stacks for the Eternal Radiance Sonata Effect.

<size=40><color=Title>Scorching Light</color></size>
When Zani is in <color=Highlight>Inferno Mode</color>, <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Daybreak</color>, <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Dawning</color>, <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Nightfall</color>, and <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Lightsmash</color> become available, which deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> that is considered both Heavy Attack DMG and <color=Highlight>Spectro Frazzle</color> DMG.
When Blaze is no less than {2}, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Standard Defense Protocol</color> is replaced with Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Scorching Light</color>.
Hold <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> to enter <color=Highlight>Ready Stance</color>, during which Zani is immune to interruption. This state ends early when Zani is switched off the field. While in <color=Highlight>Ready Stance</color>, release <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> button within a certain time to consume Blaze and perform <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Daybreak</color>.
When attacked in a certain time after entering <color=Highlight>Ready Stance</color>, reduce this instance of damage by 100% and Stagnate nearby targets, then perform <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Lightsmash</color>, consuming Blazes and further reducing their <te href=850062>Vibration Strength</te> by {3}. Zani's DMG taken within the next {4}s is reduced by {5}.
After casting <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Lightsmash</color>, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Nightfall</color>, consuming up to {6} Blazes on hit, with each Blaze increasing the DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Nightfall</color>. If <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Nightfall Stage 1</color> is interrupted, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> again to cast <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Nightfall Stage 2</color>.
Upon releasing the button after a certain time or when <color=Highlight>Ready Stance</color> ends, immediately perform <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Nightfall</color>.
When Blaze is no less than {2}, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Daybreak</color>. After entering <color=Highlight>Inferno Mode</color>, casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> immediately replaces the current <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> with Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Scorching Light</color>. Hold <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> to enter <color=Highlight>Ready Stance</color>.
After performing <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Daybreak</color>, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> immediately to perform <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Dawning</color> at the cost of Blaze.
After performing <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Dawning</color>, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Nightfall</color>.
If <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> is not replaced with <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Nightfall</color> after a successful Dodge and Zani has no less than {2} Blazes, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> within a certain time to perform <color=Highlight>Heavy Slash - Lightsmash</color> at the cost of Blazes.

<size=40><color=Title>Redundant Energy</color></size>
Zani can hold up to 100 Redundant Energy.
Obtain Redundant Energy when Normal Attacks hit a target.
Obtain Redundant Energy when casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Immediate Execution</color>.
Obtain Redundant Energy when casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Standard Defense Protocol</color>.
Obtain Redundant Energy when casting  <color=Highlight>Pinpoint Strike</color>.
Cannot obtain Redundant Energy while in <color=Highlight>Inferno Mode</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Blaze</color></size>
Blaze is capped at 100 when not in <color=Highlight>Inferno Mode</color>.
Blaze is capped at 150 in <color=Highlight>Inferno Mode</color>.
Casting <color=Highlight>Targeted Action</color> or <color=Highlight>Forcible Riposte</color> grants 10 Blazes.
Every stack of Heliacal Ember converted from <color=Highlight><te href=850008>Spectro Frazzle</te></color> grants 5 Blazes.
Casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Rekindle</color> grants 50 Blazes.

params.name: Beacon For the Future
params.description: Attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> equal to {0} of Zani's ATK and removing all stacks of <te href=850066>Heliacal Ember</te> inflicted upon the target. Each stack increases the DMG dealt by {1}. This DMG is considered <color=Highlight><te href=850008>Spectro Frazzle</te></color> DMG. The Spectro DMG dealt by other Resonators in the team to the target marked by <color=Highlight>Heliacal Ember</color> is Amplified by {2} for {3}s.

params.name: Tune Break: Gauntlets
params.description: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
